divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving down Rt 71 right before Rt 76 going south and right behind me there was this bright white light followed by 4 bright flashes of blue and one of green that filled the whole sky! It looked luke the light was on the groud and went outward and was BRIGHT! Did not see any object. Not sure what it was...
Summary: bright white light followed by 4 bright flashes of blue and one of green that filled the whole sky!
trends: There have been no other sightings in Seville
This sighting has never been favorited.
